Presentation.title: Hello, I'm Giovanni Vicentin
Presentation.description: I am a software engineer driven by the purpose of helping people and a passion for developing software. I have extensive experience with various technologies, with a primary focus on React, Next.js, Node.js, Nest.js, and the entire JavaScript stack.

sams.title: Software Engineer
sams.description: Revamped the Sam’s Club registration system, created APIs to manage user data, and optimized the platform, increasing the membership base, engagement, and site performance.

talst.title: Software Engineer
talst.description: Developed software focused on increasing system efficiency, automating processes, and enhancing performance metrics across various projects.

frankMetalicas.title: Frank Metálicas
frankMetalicas.description: Development of a website for Frank Metálicas, focusing on digital presence and SEO optimization.
frankMetalicas.expandedDescription: I developed a website for Frank Metálicas with the goal of establishing a robust digital presence, making it easier to showcase products and services, display completed projects, and connect with clients. Using technologies like Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, Node.js, Zod, and React Hook Form, I optimized the website for search engines, boosting the company’s visibility on Google. As a result, there was a significant increase in contact inquiries and the company gained prominence in online searches.

tecnojund.title: Tecnojund
tecnojund.description: Complete overhaul of the Tecnojund website for lead conversion in the “/chamados” page.
tecnojund.expandedDescription: I rebuilt the Tecnojund website from scratch with the aim of modernizing the brand, enhancing user experience, and increasing lead conversion. The main challenge was the lack of an efficient form for opening service tickets with email submission. Now, the website includes a /tickets page that meets this need. As a result, there has been a significant increase in organic traffic, lead generation, and the closing of new contracts.

betterFit.description: Coming Soon: A Game-Changing Fitness Experience
betterFit.expandedDescription: Coming Soon: A Game-Changing Fitness Experience

ContactSection.title: Get in Touch
ContactSection.description: I'd love to hear from you! Feel free to reach out with any questions or inquiries.
